title: Teresa Giudice believes husband Joe cheated on her in tell-all interview
text:
While Teresa and Joe Giudice have attempted to portray themselves as a united front in the past, the “Real Housewives of New Jersey” stars are now airing their dirty laundry for the world to see, confronting each other about the rumors of infidelity that have surrounded their marriage for years.

In a clip of the upcoming Bravo special “The Real Housewives of New Jersey Special Event: Joe and Teresa Unlocked,” the couple candidly discuss their suspicions that they each cheated on their incarcerated partner.

‘RHONJ’ STAR JOE GIUDICE BREAKS HIS SILENCE AFTER ARRIVING IN ITALY

When asked by host Andy Cohen if he was faithful to Teresa while she served time for fraud, Joe responded, “I was, actually, yeah.” He doubts, however, that she was faithful to him during his time behind bars, partially because of photos taken of Teresa out with other men while Joe was still locked up.

“You were photographed with women also,” Teresa reminded her husband, to which he responded, “That’s why I made it OK for you.”

Teresa also believes Joe broke their marital vows but did say she’s “happy he’s free” through tears. Joe was recently sent to his home country of Italy to await a verdict in his current immigration case.

TERESA GIUDICE SAYS HUSBAND JOE GIUDICE’S DEPORTATION RULING IS TO ‘MAKE AN EXAMPLE OUT OF US’

The clip drops shortly after family attorney James Leonard Jr. released a statement claiming the pair have been faithful to one another, saying, “They have been writing about cheating and divorce rumors for the last 10 years, but guess what? Nobody is cheating, nobody is getting divorced.”

“The Real Housewives of New Jersey Special Event: Joe and Teresa Unlocked” airs Oct. 27 at 8 p.m. on Bravo.

This story originally appeared in the New York Post.
description: The couple is confronting each other about the rumors of infidelity that have surrounded their marriage for years.
